data.title: carvery/garden/country pub near the Wiltshire White Horses
data.meta_description: Offering superb pub food & Sunday lunch just outside Swindon. Our pub garden offers superb views of the Wiltsthire countryside alongside motorhome parking. Find us just 7 miles outside Swindon near the White Horses of Hackpen & Broad Town
data.text:
ESCAPE TO THE WILTSHIRE COUNTRYSIDE

*** COME AND ENJOY THE SUMMER WITH US! ***

Find us in the heart of the village of Broad Hinton, nr Swindon, where a seasonal menu and excellently curated drinks from locally-brewed ales to cocktails awaits.

Visiting the area in a caravan or motorhome? They come and stay awhile with us!

We look forward to welcoming you.
